festival.introText:
The Funk & Soul Weekender

The Soundcrash Funk & Soul Weekender’s Main Event! A huge day of funk, soul, disco & beyond with a massive lineup of legends playing live alongside some of the best DJs in the World, at Dreamland.

faqs.question: What happens if I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent. Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: When is The Soundcrash Funk & Soul Weekender 2023?
faqs.answer: Funk & Soul Weekender takes place on Friday 2nd June - Sunday 4th June 2023.

faqs.question: How to get to Funk & Soul Weekender
faqs.answer:
The festival is located at Dreamland, Margate.

 

Dreamland’s entrance is on Marine Terrace, Margate, CT9 1XJ; the entrance to the Amusement Park is just to the side of the cinema on Hall By The Sea Road.

 

The closest rail station is Margate which is a 10 minute walk to the venue.

faqs.question: Does Funk & Soul Weekender have onsite camping?
faqs.answer: For information on camping please contact  info@funkandsoulweekender.com

faqs.question: Accessibility information
faqs.answer:
All of Dreamland’s restaurants and shops are accessible for wheelchairs. Accessible Toilets are available throughout Dreamland park. Please note that some of these facilities are fitted with a Radar Key, you are therefore advised to bring your own key to avoid unnecessary waits.

 

Most of the area is paved with flat surfaces and paths. If you require additional assistance do not hesitate to ask a member of the Dreamland Team.

 

Hearing Loops are provided when requested.

 

Please note wheelchairs are not available to hire at Dreamland, we therefore advise you to bring your own. Any further questions can be directed to the Dreamland Guest Experience Team (office@dreamland.co.uk).

 

For any other accessibility queries please contact: info@funkandsoulweekender.com

faqs.question: Where is The Soundcrash Funk & Soul Weekender?
faqs.answer: The Funk & Soul Weekender is held at Dreamland in Margate.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer:
Around the corner from Dreamland is Arlington Car Park, located on All Saints Avenue, Margate, CT9 5QH. The parking is £7 for one day and can be booked in advance here: https://shop.myonlinebooking.co.uk/dreamland/buy.aspx?tid=27

 

Arlington Car Park cannot accommodate coaches due to height and weight restrictions.

faqs.question: I need to bring a personal assistant or carer. Can they get a ticket?
faqs.answer:
No problem! Tickets for entry with a carer can be purchased on the Dreamland website here: https://dreamland.seetickets.com/event/the-soundcrash-funk-and-soul-weekender/dreamland-margate/1446299

 

If you require a carer, proof of eligibility will need to be supplied on entry at the event alongside your ticket. You will need to provide one of the following forms of documentation:

– A certified NHS letter from your doctor or consultant clearly stating why you are eligible for a carer ticket

– A letter from a professional body (eg Nurse, Bupa Healthcare Advisor etc) clearly stating why you are eligible for a carer ticket

– A DLA, DWP or PIP letter stating you are entitled to a carer ticket

– A valid Max Card

– Blue Badges are not accepted

faqs.question: What time does the festival run?
faqs.answer: The festival runs on all three days. Dreamland will be open from 12pm til late. The after-party venues will be open from 11pm til late.

faqs.question: Can children come to The Soundcrash Funk & Soul Weekender?
faqs.answer:
Friday 29th and Saturday 30th May – strictly 18+

 

Sunday 31st May – All ages are welcome. Under 16s must be accompanied by an adult over the age of 18.

faqs.question: When will my favourite funk & soul acts be on at the festival?
faqs.answer: Day splits for Friday, Saturday and Sunday will be announced soon and can be viewed on the line-up page of the festival website here: https://funkandsoulweekender.com/line-up/?_gl=1*1l81wzx*_up*MQ..*_ga*NjkwMDI0OTk2LjE2Njg1MTQ4NDk.*_ga_TV7SSZQT8M*MTY2ODUxNDg0OS4xLjEuMTY2ODUxNDg2Mi4wLjAuMA..*_ga_6FWGJPZLSF*MTY2ODUxNDg0OS4xLjAuMTY2ODUxNDg0OS4wLjAuMA..

location.address: Front Doors off Hall By The Sea Road. 49-51 Marine Terrace,
